note: Netizen; singularitarian; professional gadfly; semi colons; deeply unserious; 💙 Linux; Dogecoin maximalist 🚀 - I oppose nuclear doomsday.

This is the official Mastodon account for Democrats Abroad, the Democratic Party arm for the millions of Americans living outside the US. We strive to provide Americans abroad with a Democratic voice in our government and to elect Democratic candidates by mobilizing the overseas vote.

If you're a US citizen who lives abroad, YOU CAN VOTE in the upcoming #2024Election.

To register, or get overseas voting information for your state, go to http://VoteFromAbroad.org.

We post daily.

note: I suppose I should fill this in, but the word count is too small for all I'd like to say. I believe it was G. B. Shaw that said, "If I had more time, I would have written less."

I apologize ahead of time for getting any pronouns wrong. If I do, I promise it's not on purpose, I'm just old and slow.

I know I'm supposed to be civil, but I make no promises if I interact with any fascists, white supremacists, or other far-right savages. Expect me to say a lot about politics.

I'm anticapitalist, but not crazy about Marx's solution.

I'm Japanese, Norwegian, and Swedish. I like cooking and nerd stuff.

note: Forgiving yourself can be much harder than forgiving other people. I'm not there yet. I have a tendency to share more personal information than I should or that anyone wants to hear. My first grade teacher's message on my first report card said, "Patty talks too much". Some things never change. I have strong opinions and usually don't mind sharing them. I like living alone, but sometimes it really sucks. #LGBTQ advocate #MentalHealthAdvocate #Soccer #MLS
